dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Sands [mailto:mail@clanplanet.co.uk] 
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 2004 7:22 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

 

Works of my own have been copied by a website which offers a similar setup.
The following URL's show the work which was copied.

http://www.ufgl.co.uk/?p=MoH_rules

http://www.ufgl.co.uk/?p=MOHSH_rules

 

The original works which i created are at the following page:
http://www.clanplanet.co.uk/page.asp?page=faq
<http://www.clanplanet.co.uk/page.asp?page=faq&KB=KBshowID&KBID=1>
&KB=KBshowID&KBID=1

 

The page was slightly changed after i warned that the website owner was
using copyrighted material and he agreed by saying in an instant messaging
conversation "i have done wrong".
'CPCrew' identifies staff who work at my website (
<http://www.clanplanet.co.uk/> www.clanplanet.co.uk) and has been changed to
'UFGL' the name of the website who copied my work in every instance.

 

This material was copied without written or oral permission from myself, the
copyright holder

 

To the best of my knowledge the information provided in this email is
accurate

 

 

I may be contacted at the following address:

Paul Sands
16 Dunvegan
Glenmavis
Airdrie
United Kingdom

ML6 0PZ

By telephone:

+44 1236 754 786

By Email:

copyright@clanplanet.co.uk

 

 

 

Thank you for your time

-Paul Sands

Clanplanet.co.uk Director
